title: Dream house
creator_credit: Swinburne Institute of Technology. Film and Television School and Sally Pryor
brief_description: A dream in which the dreamer imagines she can travel into her own brain using computer animation. This brain has a structure like a house, with each room containing images of personality and personal experience.
creator_credit_for_label: Swinburne Institute of Technology. Film and Television School and Sally Pryor
